== Side by Side Installation of Ubuntu GNOME ==

* Choose '''Install Ubuntu GNOME'''
<nowiki>[[File:install.png]]</nowiki>
----

* It's recommended to select both optional boxes here if you want the most up to date and functional system possible.  If you don't have an Internet connection though, don't worry about not being able to update yet.
<nowiki>[[File:prepare.png]]</nowiki>
----

* Select '''Install Ubuntu GNOME 13.10 alongside''' ''existing operating system'' (i.e. Windows, Mac)
<nowiki>[[File:type.png]]</nowiki>
----

* Choose the size of the partition for your new Ubuntu GNOME installation.  Your '''existing''' OS will always be the slot on the '''left'''.
<nowiki>[[File:partition.png]]</nowiki>
----

* Once you are sure that the size you picked for your partition is the size you want, select '''Continue'''.  This will take a while, but after this step all you need to do is follow the simple informational prompts.
<nowiki>[[File:continue.png]]</nowiki>
----
'''''Thank you for choosing and using Ubuntu GNOME.'''''
